special_powers.name: MODULATING THE CLOAKING DEVICE
special_powers.description: Smoke Cloud. When Romulan Officer uses it, you may also generate a hindering terrain marker in each square within range that's occupied by a friendly character with the Romulan keyword. At the beginning of your next turn, remove these markers.

special_powers.name: WE ARE CONDUCTING MILITARY EXERCISES...IT WOULD BE WISE IF YOU CHANGED COURSE IMMEDIATELY
special_powers.description: When Cardassian Soldier hits an adjacent opposing single-base character, after resolutions you may place that character into a square adjacent to their current square.

special_powers.name: FERENGI ENERGY WHIP
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Ferengi Trader hits with a close attack and used Incapacitate to give action tokens, after resolutions roll a d6. 5-6: Deal a hit character 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: TAME THE WARRIOR
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - Friendly characters that are adjacent or have the Romulan keyword modify defense +1 against close attacks.

special_powers.name: THE BLOOD WILL TELL
special_powers.description: FREE: If a friendly character that's adjacent or has the Klingon keyword was attacked since your last turn, modify attack +1 this turn.

special_powers.name: YOU WILL ABIDE BY STARFLEET REGULATIONS
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Starfleet Admiral uses it and succeeds, you may instead choose one: Remove an action token from a non-adjacent friendly character and that character can't attack this turn -or- Give an action token to a friendly character (you can't choose a character with two already) and if you do, Action Total +1 this turn.

special_powers.name: ENHANCED VISOR
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose an adjacent friendly character. That character can use Improved Targeting: Hindering until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: DATA
special_powers.description: FREE: If Lt. Commander Data began your turn on the map, replace him with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: IF THEY HAVE A MEANS OF DISCOVERING US, THEY MUST BE DESTROYED
special_powers.description: Friendly characters that are adjacent or have the Romulan keyword modify attack +2 when attacking only opposing characters that can use Improved Targeting: Hindering.

special_powers.name: I HAVE DISCOVERED TRAITORS AMONG US
special_powers.description: Opposing characters can't use Shape Change when attacked by friendly characters that are adjacent or have the Romulan keyword.

special_powers.name: WHO I CHOOSE TO SPEND MY FREE TIME WITH...THAT'S MY BUSINESS
special_powers.description: When an opposing character successfully breaks away from Cardassian Glinn, after resolutions roll a d6. 5-6: Deal that character 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: ACCORDING TO THE FERENGI RULES OF ACQUISITION...WE DECLARE THIS SHIP TO BE A LOSS
special_powers.description: During the game setup, you may choose one: place one of your opponent's objects -or- generate a standard light object in any square on the map not in a starting area.

special_powers.name: YOU WILL COOPERATE WITH OUR SALVAGE OPERATION
special_powers.description: Opposing Equipment-Objects have Equip (Any) and Unequip (Drop) instead. When a friendly character that's adjacent or has the Ferengi keyword hits an opposing character that's equipped, after resolutions the hit character unequips their equipment.

special_powers.name: DEFECTOR...
special_powers.description: If Alidor Jarok is part of a Starfleet themed team, friendly charatcers that are adjacent or have the Starfleet keyword can use Improved Targeting: Hindering and modify defense +1 against attacks by characters with the Romulan keyword.

special_powers.name: ...OR SPY?
special_powers.description: If Alidor Jarok is part of a Romulan themed team, he can use Telekinesis, but instead places opposing characters.

special_powers.name: KILL HIM!...IT'S THE KLINGON WAY
special_powers.description: When a firendly character that's adjacent or has the Klingon keyword damages an opposing character with an attack, after resolutions deal that opposing character 1 penetrating damage. If that character is not KO'd, immediately heal it 1 click.

special_powers.name: MY BROTHER KURN WILL JOIN US IN BATTLE
special_powers.description: POWER: Once per game, place adjacent a TBG# 014a Kurn from your Sideline on click #1, 2, or 3. This game, Kurn can't: be carried, be equipped, be given DOUBLE POWER actions, replace or be replaced. This game, Kurn returns to your Sideline: At the beginning of your next turn, immediately if no square he occupies is within 5 squares of Worf, or he is removed from the map by another effect.

special_powers.name: MAY YOU DIE WELL
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose an opposing character within range that has the Klingon, Martial Artist or Warrior keyword and has 0 or 1 action tokens. At the end of the chosen character's next turn, if it did not make an attack, deal it 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: NO MORE ROMULAN DECEPTIONS
special_powers.description: Combat Reflexes. Friendly characters that are adjacent of have the Klingon Keyword modify defense +1 against attacks by characters with the Klingon or Romulan keyword.

special_powers.name: I'M NOT GOING TO LEAVE AND LET YOU DIE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, Dr. Beverly Crusher can use Support at no cost, but only to target a character damaged by an opponent's attack since your last turn.

special_powers.name: HEAD OF STARFLEET MEDICAL
special_powers.description: Leadership, Support. When Dr. Beverly Crusher or an adjacent friendly character uses Support, apply -1 instead of -2 to the result.

special_powers.name: GET THEM OUT OF THERE, O'BRIEN
special_powers.description: If Miles O'Brien has 0 or 1 action tokens, friendly characters that are adjacent or have the Starfleet keyword can use Super Senses. When a character uses this Super Senses and succeeds, give Miles O'Brien an action token and place that character adjacent to Miles O'Brien.

special_powers.name: CONTINUITY
special_powers.description: When Captain Jean-Luc Picard, U.S.S. Enterprise is KO'd friendly characters can't make attacks on your next turn.

special_powers.name: ON MY COMMAND
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose one: MOVE -or- CLOSE -or- RANGE. Actions of the chosen type given to friendly characters that are adjacent or have the Starfleet keyword don't count against your action total this turn.

special_powers.name: TRANSPORTER
special_powers.description: Transporter: FREE: Choose a character on your sideline with the Starfleet keyword and a starting line for that character. You may pay 1PP plus 1PP per 10 full points of the character's cost to place that character on the starting line in an unoccupied square within 6 squares and line of fire. A force may have only one character placed by this effect on the map at a time. (Example: You would pay 5PP for a 40-49 point character.)

special_powers.name: ALLIED WITH THE HOUSE OF DURAS
special_powers.description: During force construction, characters with the Klingon keyword gain the Romulan keyword and characters with the Romulan keyword gain the Klingon keyword.

special_powers.name: PLAY ON THEIR SENTIMENT
special_powers.description: Shape Change. When a friendly character that's adjacent or has the Romulan keyword is damaged by an opponent's attack, after resolutions you may place the attacker into a square adjacent to the one it occupies.

special_powers.name: WEAKEN YOUR ALLIANCES
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Sela uses it and succeeds, you may instead choose that opponents can't use themed Probability Control until your next turn.

special_powers.name: MAJOR RAKAL OF THE TAL SHIAR
special_powers.description: Shape Change. When a friendly character that's adjacent or has the Romulan or Starfleet keyword is damaged by an opponent's attack, choose an opposing character adjacent to the attacker. After resolutions deal the chosen character 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: UNDERGROUND FACTION OF REBELS
special_powers.description: Mind Control. When Deanna Troi uses it, hit characters can use Improved Movement: Characters.

special_powers.name: LEAVE THIS TERRITORY OR BE DESTROYED
special_powers.description: Friendly characters that are adjacent or have the Cardassian keyword modify attack +1 when attacking characters that are closer to your starting area than their own.

special_powers.name: WE HAVE ALL THE EVIDENCE WE NEED...WE HAVE CAPTAIN PICARD
special_powers.description: Telekinesis, but instead places opposing characters.

special_powers.name: WE SEEK ONLY WHAT IS EQUITABLE
special_powers.description: When an opposing character uses an effect that allows it to choose a power to use, you may roll a d6. 5-6: Choose a friendly character that's adjacent or has the Ferengi keyword. That character can use the chosen power(s) until the end of your next turn.

special_powers.name: THE HUMANS ARE DESTROYERS OF LEGAL COMMERCE
special_powers.description: Enhancement, Outwit.

special_powers.name: I LOOK FORWARD TO OUR NEXT MEETING CAPTAIN
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Tomalak would be KO'd, instead him to click #3 and for the rest of the game he can't use this trait.

special_powers.name: DISHONORABLE TACTICS
special_powers.description: Perplex, but only to target opposing characters. When he uses Perplex, choose a keyword on the target. UNIQUE MODIFIER - Until your next turn, other opposing characters with the chosen keyword also modify the chosen combat value -1.

special_powers.name: TECHNIQUE FOR WIPING MEMORY ENGRAMS
special_powers.description: POWER: Choose an adjacent character. Until your next turn that character has PROTECTED: Outwit, Opposing Perplex. // She may activate this power as FREE instead, but only to choose a character she shares a keyword with.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: WORF
special_powers.description: FREE: If Lt Worf began your turn on the map, replace him with another character with this trait on the same click number.

special_powers.name: MY FATHER'S BAT'LETH
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When Lt. Worf uses it, for the d6 roll you may instead roll 2d6 and keep one as the result. If the results of both dice match, after resolutions you may either heal Lt. Worf 1 click -or- remove an action token from Lt. Worf.

special_powers.name: IT SEEMS TO FEED ON OUR PHASER ENERGY
special_powers.description: Steal Energy. When Armus is damaged by a range attack, after resolutions heal Armus 1 click.

special_powers.name: HE WAS LEFT HERE. ABANDONED
special_powers.description: Plasticity, Sidestep. At the end of your turn, if Armus is not within 4 squares of another character, deal Armus 1 unavoidable damage. If you do, you may then place him exactly 4 squares away from any other character.

special_powers.name: THE CREATURE IS FILLED WITH RAGE...WHEN HE CONFRONTS IT HIS GUARD GOES DOWN
special_powers.description: Invincible. If Armus can use Battle Fury, modify his defense +1 and this power has Protected: Outwit.

special_powers.name: CONTINUITY
special_powers.description: When Gul Madred, Chief Interrogator is KO'd, for the rest of the game, when an opposing character's (finalized) attack roll includes a 4, modify their damage +1.

special_powers.name: NO...THERE ARE FIVE LIGHTS!
special_powers.description: FREE: Until your next turn, when an opposing character's (finalized) attack roll includes a 4, after resolutions, deal that character 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: TRANSPORTER
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose a character on your sideline with the Cardassian keyword and a starting line for that character. You may pay 1 Plot Point plus 1 Plot Point per 10 full points of the character's cost to place that character on the starting line in an unoccupied square within 6 squares and line of fire. A force may have only one character placed by this effect on the map at a time. (Example: You would pay 5 Plot Points for a 40-49 point character.)

special_powers.name: THOUGHT MAKER
special_powers.description: Stealth, Mind Control. When Daimon Bok uses Mind Control, modify range +3 and he can use Improved Targeting: Blocking, Characters, Hindering.

special_powers.name: COLLECTING ON AN OLD DEBT
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Daimon Bok uses it, after resolutions give the hit character a Debt token. // Characters modify attack and defense -1 for each Debt token they have. (Only as long as he can use this power.)

special_powers.name: HAVEN'T BEEN SLEEPING WELL?
special_powers.description: Mastermind, Willpower. Opposing characters within range can't use Willpower.

special_powers.name: HOLODECK SAFETY PROTOCOLS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, give Professor Moriarty 3 Safety Protocol tokens. While he has a Safety Protocol token, opposing characters take a maximum of 1 damage from his attacks. // When Professor Moriarty uses Outwit, after resolutions remove a Safety Protocol token.

special_powers.name: OVERRIDING COMMAND CONTROLS
special_powers.description: Outwit, Perplex. When Professor Moriarty uses either to target an opposing character, until your next turn the target can't use team abilities and Professor Moriarty can use any team abilities the target can't use through this effect.

special_powers.name: OPPORTUNISTIC MANEUVER
special_powers.description: FREE: Once per turn, for all characters that can use this trait, choose a friendly character that took 2 or more damage from a single attack since your last turn. You may place Geordi La Forge within 6 squares and line of fire of the opposing character that made that attack. You may then replace Mirror Geordi La Forge with another character that can use the Opportunistic Maneuver trait from your sideline (on the same click number).

special_powers.name: ADVANCING THROUGH THE RANKS
special_powers.description: When this character is placed by a character's use of the Opportunistic Maneuver trait, until your next turn, this character has "When an opposing character within 6 squares is given a FREE action, after resolutions deal that character 1 penetrating damage."

special_powers.name: MIRROR, MIRROR
special_powers.description: Shape Change. When Mirror Geordi La Forge uses Shape Change and succeeds, give him a Mirror token and, if he fails, remove all Mirror tokens. When he uses Shape Change, increase the result by +1 for each Mirror token (a roll of 1 always fails).

special_powers.name: REROUTING BRIDGE CONTROLS
special_powers.description: Once per turn, when an opposing character within range would us an effect that allows it to choose standard power(s) to use, you may make them choose again, but they must choose different power(s) than before.

special_powers.name: OPPORTUNISTIC MANEUVER
special_powers.description: FREE: Once per turn, for all characters that can use this trait, choose a friendly character that took 2 or more damage from a single attack since your last turn. You may place Mirror Jen-Luc Picard within 6 squares and line of fire of the opposing character that made the attack. You may then replace Mirror Jean-Luc Picard with another character that can use the Opportunistic Maneuver trait from your sideline (on the same click number).

special_powers.name: ADVANCING THROUGH THE RANKS
special_powers.description: When this character is placed by a character's use of the Opportunistic Maneuver trait, until your next turn, this character has "Opposing characters within 6 squares can't use Leadership, Mastermind or Perplex."

special_powers.name: MIRROR, MIRROR
special_powers.description: Shape Change. When Mirror Jen-Luc Picard uses Shape Change and succeeds, give him a Mirror token, and if he fails, remove all Mirror tokens. When he uses Shape Change, increase the result +1 for each Mirror token (a roll of 1 always fails).

special_powers.name: TO ENSLAVE NEW LIFE AND NEW CIVILIZATIONS
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Mirror Jean-Luc Picard uses it, if there is no d6 on this card, you may place the d6 result on this card.//When a character within range rolls an attack roll or rolls for Blades/Claws/Fangs or Leadership, you may remove the d6 from this card and replace a die in the roll with it.
